name: RIGID (PANDAKO)
description:
This game is a chronicle of the world that developed quantum weapons.

This game is in development but you can play it.

⌨ Controls

Common
Move : WASD keys
Turning : Mouse
Fire : Left mouse button
Show mouse cursor: ESC key

The operation differs depending on the tank.

💱 I need your help to translate this game.

If you have any strange English in this game, please let me know in the comments.
If you understand Japanese, you can also translate it into your language.
